name: A.D.M.I.N.
description: A.D.M.I.N programs a custom configuration per player each game.

name: Anima Squad
description: Anima Squad members build fame for scoring champion kills. When they pause to celebrate a kill, they permanently gain 6 maximum Health per point of fame. Fame immediately benefits the whole Anima Squad.

name: Brawler
description: When deploying the Arsenal champion, players may choose which weapon he will equip.

name: Civilian
description: If there is a Civilian alive, your team is inspired to protect them by gaining Mana every 2 seconds.

name: Gadgeteen
description: Gadgeteens create random modified weapon which with powerful effects. Any champion can equip the items, but they fall apart after 1 player combat.

name: LaserCorps
description: When a LaserCorp agent attacks or is hit by an attack, their combat drone has a 50% chance to deal magic damage to the agent's target (0.5 second cooldown). When a LaserCorps agent dies, their drone is reassigned to the nearest living agent.

name: Mecha: PRIME
description: Combat start: the PRIME combines with the 2 nearest Mecha, absorbing 100% of their Health.

name: Ox Force
description: Ox Force units gain a range of Attack Speed that ramps as they lose Health. Once per combat, they become invulnerable for 1 seconds as they defend the city with their last breath.

name: Star Guardian
description: Gain more Mana from all sources.

name: Supers
description: Combat start: strike a pose that grants your team 20% bonus damage, which increases by 5% for every 3-star champion on your team.

name: Threat
description: Threats do not have a Trait bonus, but instead have powerful Abilities and increased base stats.

name: Underground
description: The Underground must sneak through the sewers and crack 10 locks to open a vault. When the vault opens, you may choose to take the loot now, or attempt another heist for even better rewards.

name: Ace
description: This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Aces.

name: Aegis
description: Your team gains bonus Magic Resist, and Aegis units gain more.

name: Brawler
description: Brawlers gain additional maximum Health.

name: Corrupted
description: Combat starts: Lie dormant while absorbing the souls of allies that die. Gain 40 Ability Power for each soul. Once per combat at 60% Health (or when your team has died), come alive and fight.

name: Defender
innate:: Taunt nearby enemies after the start of combat.
description: Your team gains bonus Armor, and Defenders gain more.
taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter.

name: Duelist
description: Duelists' basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed, up to 10 stacks.

name: Forecaster
description: At the start of combat, Forecaster champions grant adjacent allies different buffs depending on the current weather, which changes every game.
sunny: Combat start: Grant a 400/600/4000 Health shield to adjacent allies for 10/10/45 seconds.
windy: Combat start: grant bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power to adjacent allies, increasing by 15/25/150% every 5 seconds.
rainy: At the start of combat, Forecaster champions grant adjacent allies 20 / 40 / 100 mana until they have cast 1/1/100 spells.

name: Hacker
description: Hackers gain Omnivamp and summon a H4ckerr!m. Any unit placed in the rider hex will be sent to the enemy backline and is untargetable for the first 2 seconds of combat.

name: Heart
description: When Heart units cast their Ability, your team gains stacking Ability Power for the rest of combat.

name: Mascot
description: Your team heals a percentage of their maximum Health every 2 seconds, and Mascots heal double the amount. When Mascots die, they retreat to the sidelines to cheer on your team. Your team's healing increased by 1% for each cheering Mascot.

name: Prankster
description: Once per combat at 50% Health, spawn a target dummy, move to a safe location, and restore 350 Health.

name: Revenant
description: If there is an enemy nearby, Recon units will dash to safety before casting their Ability.

name: Renegade
description: Renegade units deal bonus damage, and the last sone standing deals more.

name: Spellslinger
description: Every 5 seconds, the next attack instead fires a magic orb at a random target, which explodes for 50% Ability Power as magic damage.

name: Sureshot
description: Combat start: gain bonus Attack Damage now, and every 4 seconds.
